mapper.insert: insert into tb_mobile_session (session_id, login_token, app_deviceinfo, app_system, app_channel, last_login_time, user_id) values (#{sessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appDeviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_mobile_session set login_token = #{loginToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_deviceinfo = #{appDeviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_system = #{appSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_channel = #{appChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select session_id, login_token, app_deviceinfo, app_system, app_channel, last_login_time, user_id from tb_mobile_session where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select session_id, login_token, app_deviceinfo, app_system, app_channel, last_login_time, user_id from tb_mobile_session where app_deviceinfo = #{appDeviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select session_id, login_token, app_deviceinfo, app_system, app_channel, last_login_time, user_id from tb_mobile_session
